page.title: 16TRANSPORT IN TIDWORTH
page.content: The main A338 road from Marlborough to Salisbury runs North to South through Tidworth and the A3026 goes to Ludgershall. A minor road goes west to Bulford and east towards Andover. The main private transport is cars, motorcycles and bicycles. A private Coach Company operates from Tidworth and does excursions both locally and abroad, it also operates a school bus service. National Coaches travel via Heathrow Airport to London passing through Tidworth approximately every two hours. There are also several taxi firms based in Tidworth. Public trans- port includes a regular bus service which passes through Tidworth en route for Salisbury and Andover. Other buses travel to Devizes and Marlborough. There are also a variety of military vehicles,a number of which are used for domestic purposes,mainly welfare.
